title: Dream Interpretation of Riding in a Dream According to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

Seeing riding a horse in a dream means honor, livelihood and other interpretations. We will explain this for an unmarried girl, or a married woman, or a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, or a man, such as riding a horse , or riding a brown horse , or riding a white horse, or riding with a stranger or a stranger. Known to Ibn Sirin and more on the subject:

Interpretation of riding a horse in a dream

  1. The seer who sees that he is riding this horse indicates that the dreamer is a person of dignity, honor and high position
  2. Riding in a dream without a bridle on it, this dream indicates kindness in general
  3. Riding is also interpreted as traveling to a land of goodness and blessings, as if God grants you a child, or makes you rich, or performs Hajj for you, or marries you, or gives you victory. An enemy or a married woman who protects you and almost all horse interpretations are positive and contain good news
  4. Whoever sees that he is riding a steed without anything on it (the horse is naked and uncovered), this indicates that whoever sees him is honest, proud and generous, and has dignity in his family.
  5. The meaning of the flying horse: that the seer is a good man among his people
  6. If you see a horse walking calmly, it means that the person who sees it has influence, power and status
  7. If the dreamer sees that he is riding a horse and the horse is angry, this means that he will commit forbidden things, which will bring trouble to the dreamer.
  8. Seeing a horse of a blond color usually indicates goodness and innocence, because angels ride it
  9. Seeing a horse of iron means that the dreamer can expect death
  10. If you see a group of horses with saddles on them and no one is riding them, this indicates a gathering of females, as we gather at an event or wedding.
  11. Whoever sees himself playing and playing with horses shows psychological comfort and gets a lot of good and happiness in life.
  12. If you see a small horse or what is called a foal in your dream, this is evidence that God will bless you with a male child of beauty and money.
  13. If you see a brown horse in your dream, this is evidence that God will save you from poverty
  14. The horse made entirely of stone refers to marriage to a woman of extraordinary beauty
  15. The mare in the dream refers to a house of an acceptable middle level
  16. The gray horse means God's victory over the enemy
  17. The black horse appears as problems and fears
  18. The blond horse for you to acquire knowledge in religion and knowledge that God will grant you

Interpretation of riding a horse in a dream

The horse in the dream of a single man has many good connotations, sometimes it indicates success and sometimes the horse symbolizes security, while riding a horse often symbolizes marriage or engagement, especially if the horse is white.

No matter how different the color of the horse that the single woman sees in her dream, as if she is riding it, and no matter how different the places where the single person sees her walking or roaming next to the horse, the vision usually expresses her good fortune. Provided that the unmarried woman sees in her dream as if she can skillfully ride this horse.

If the girl sees in her dream that she is having difficulty directing the horse, this may mean that there are some obstacles that may stand in her way, but she can overcome them thanks to persistence, perseverance and determination. Let us not forget, ladies and gentlemen, that the horse in dream interpretation is also a symbol of challenge, whoever rides it in a dream accepts challenges and wins and achieves the highest desires.

Interpretation of riding a white horse in a dream

The white horse in the dream of the unmarried woman is good news and good, and in the interpretation of marriage, if the unmarried woman sees as if she is riding it or trying to get on it.

If the dreamer or the dreamer is in the stage of study, whether at the secondary or university level, and she sees in her dream that she is riding a white horse, the vision promises her success in academics.

Riding a white horse in a dream often indicates security or peace of heart and peace of mind, as well as a sign of future happiness, whether on a practical or emotional level.

Interpretation of riding a black horse in a dream

The black horse is also considered one of the positive symbols in women's dreams in general, and in interpretation it is good or pleasant news, and it is said that the black horse in the dream of an unmarried woman appears as a generous man or a young man. Entering her life ... If the single woman sees in her sleep as if she is riding a black steed or riding it skillfully, this is a sign of success or achievement or goal or the realization of desire. This interpretation can also apply to the brown horse or gray, as there is no hated color in the interpretation of the horse, and all horse colors are commendable, even if they seem to the viewer as hybrids or strange.

Riding a black horse in a bachelor's dream can also indicate her personal strength, self-respect and self-confidence.

If an unmarried woman dreams that she is crossing a bridge with a horse

If the unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is riding a horse and walking over a bridge, this may initially indicate a future trip, and the vision may also indicate a qualitative change in her private life... The girl with the dream may move from a state to a better state and her life changes according to her desires and aspirations for the better. The faster the horse runs, the more the vision indicates the speed of achieving desires.

The scene of crossing the bridge on a horse or mare may not be a familiar scene in girls' dreams, but seeing it is good news and a source of optimism and hope.

Interpretation of riding a horse amidst a gathering or gathering of people

If the unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is riding a beautiful horse and walking with it among large crowds, this is interpreted as a wedding or marriage or joy that is close to the viewer seeing it in the coming period.

Interpretation of riding a horse in a single dream and walking in the middle of green meadows

If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is riding a horse and walking in the middle of fields or green meadows, this expresses psychological comfort and complete reconciliation with the self. Because green places in a dream are an expression of the happiness of the soul or spirit. The cause of this happiness may be emotional or emotional, and it is also an expression of a bright future full of success and achievement on almost all levels.

This interpretation also applies to the unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she crosses or crosses a vast forest on a horse. This scene also expresses the girl or girl entering a happy stage of her life, because the forest in interpretation is a world full of joy, happiness and happiness. Seeing it in a dream is an expression of a positive psychological charge that overwhelms the girl and makes her happy

Interpretation of the bachelor falling or falling from the back of the horse

If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is falling or falling from the back of a horse...

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing a fall in a dream means a change in circumstances and other interpretations, we will explain it for single, married, pregnant, divorced, for a man, such as falling from a height or falling into a hole or seeing a fall from a ladder, according to Ibn Sirin and others, in continuation of the topic: The interpretation of falling in a dream. If the falling in the dream is from top to bottom, it indicates a transition of circumstances from good to bad, or from one wife to another, or from one job to another, or from one country to another, or from one sect to another. If a ruin or a wild animal descended in the dream, this indicates bad consequences. It may also indicate stinginess and miserliness with what he has of money, as God Almighty said: {And his wealth will not benefit him when he is corrupted}. And whoever falls from a house roof and breaks his arm or leg, he has been afflicted with a calamity. himself, or his money, or his friend, or from a power that he hates. And Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of seeing a fall, saying: Whoever sees that someone has fallen on him, then his enemy will defeat him, it is a calamity, and if his foot slips, it happens. title: Interpretation of Thyme in a Dream: Seeing Thyme in a Dream

preview.html:
html

A dream of thyme indicates strife, sorrow, and other interpretations that we will explain for single, married, pregnant, divorced, and male, such as thyme with sesame seeds , eating pies or thyme and olive oil , picking green wild thyme, and eating bread with thyme, buying thyme from the pharmacy, and giving ground thyme from Ibn Sirin to Imam al-Sadiq and others, continuing the topic:

Interpretation of Thyme in a Dream

  1. Seeing thyme in a dream indicates worry, sadness, and grief in the dreamer's life, whether now or in the near future. If the dreamer sees himself eating thyme in his dream, this indicates competition that will occur with a friend. or a colleague or close friend.
  2. If the dreamer is a businessman or the owner of a commercial or industrial project, then seeing thyme in a dream indicates a decrease in money and a decrease in profits in the project.
  3. Seeing green thyme encourages you to wait, seek correction, think positively and see, and gives you good news of comfort, God willing.
  4. If the thyme the dreamer sees is green, this is a sign of abundant material gains.
  5. Wild thyme in a dream indicates blessings that continue to flow to the dreamer and positive energy in work, especially good deeds.
  6. If the dreamer sees himself cutting wild thyme, this indicates the tightness and anxiety that he will find in the near future for one reason or another.

Interpretation of Thyme in a Dream by Ibn Sirin

Thyme in a dream indicates tightness, worry, and sadness. Whoever dreams of eating thyme falls into an argument or disaster.
It was said in the interpretation: Thyme in a dream indicates a person's inability to provide for himself, and it is not good to see it.

Interpretation of Thyme in a Dream by Ibn Shaheen

Eating thyme according to Ibn Shaheen: Eating it is an argument, and it was said to be harmful, and a shortage of money, and a lack of good vision.

Interpretation of Buying Thyme in a Dream

Whoever dreams of buying thyme with the intention of cooking or cooking, then his purchase in this vision is a loss of money or a shortage in provision.

As for whoever dreams that he is buying thyme for medicines and treatment, then the vision is worthy of praise. If the dreamer is sick, then buying thyme in a dream indicates recovery.

Buying thyme in the dream of the wealthy and the wealthy indicates a loss of money or its deficiency. But in the dream of the poor or the needy, it indicates sufficiency in provision, acquisition, and livelihood.

Buying thyme is also disliked in the dream of the debtor (the person who has many debts) because it indicates an increase in debts and inability to repay.
As for the prisoner or the afflicted, and whoever sees in his dream that he is buying thyme, God willing, he will witness salvation, innocence, and escape. Provided that he does not see that the seller has received the price of what the fortune teller has bought, otherwise the vision will be interpreted in reverse according to a general rule in the interpretation of dreams that says: All purchases in a dream are worthy of praise in dreams, unless the sleeper sees the seller receiving his price.

Interpretation of Giving Thyme in a Dream

Whoever sees in a dream that he is taking thyme from someone he knows, then he will argue with him. Whoever dreams of giving him dry or dried thyme, this is interpreted as estrangement and repulsion ... because it is hated in interpretation that a man gives his wife dry thyme, and it is hated to eat it because in both cases: thyme expresses hostility, conflict, and distance .. and perhaps separation .. and the sick men and women are excepted from this interpretation.

Interpretation of Eating Thyme in a Dream

Khalil bin Shaheen al-Zahiri hated eating thyme in a dream and said about it: Eating thyme is an indication of worry, sadness, and distress, especially if the purpose of eating it is not for treatment and healing.

Whoever dreams of eating thyme and eats it, this is its interpretation of fatigue in profit, lack of skill, lack of money, and the difficulty of life.

Interpretation of Eating Thyme in a Dream

Whoever dreams of drinking thyme soaked in water or tea during illness, then thyme in this context of interpretation is healing. And in the same context, it is preferable to see the sleeper as if he is drinking thyme, because it expresses worries and problems, because the property of oils in visions eliminates evil and evil, even if the symbol (thyme) is disliked. in its interpretation.

It is also hated to drink coffee with thyme in a dream, because both in interpretation express hardship, anxiety, and seriousness.

If the dreamer finds bitterness in drinking thyme in a dream, this is its interpretation of bitterness in his life.

Interpretation of Thyme in a Dream

Seeing thyme in a dream is one of the unfavorable visions. Whoever dreams that he is eating thyme, then he falls into a dispute or a dispute, and the vision may indicate his loss.
According to the interpretation, thyme is disliked by those who work in trade because it represents a loss.

Seeing thyme in a dream for a sick or injured man is interpreted in reverse of what was mentioned in the book (Signs in the Science of Ibratism), where thyme in this regard indicates healing and recovery, especially when drinking or eating it. Green herbal oils in a dream, if used for medical purposes in waking life, are positive symbols for pregnant women or sick men.

Interpretation of Thyme in a Dream for a Single Woman

Thyme in general indicates blows and disturbances, and it is said that it is sadness and sorrow for whoever sees it in a dream as if he is eating it. It is bad and harmful and harmful if the girl or single woman sees that she is buying it or using it for cooking or cooking. If the purpose of buying or using it in a dream is to treat a sick or sick person, then thyme is considered good and a sign of the removal of worry and distress in general.

Interpretation of Buying Thyme in a Single Girl's Dream

If an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying thyme from the market or store, she may fear disappointment or failure or failure or loss, especially if she sees that the thyme seller has received his price.

Buying thyme is disliked in a single woman's dream, unless the purpose of buying it is for treatment and healing.

If the unmarried woman is tired or worried or sick and dreams of buying thyme, then the vision is considered auspicious, because buying the disliked symbolizes the revenge of evil and the repulsion of calamity.

Interpretation of Giving Thyme in a Single Girl's Dream

Most interpreters dislike the interpretation of thyme in a dream because it was used in the past as incense that was placed inside the coffins of the dead during funerals.

It is also inappropriate for a single woman to take thyme or give it to her lover or fiancee, because thyme here may indicate competition or ...

It was said in the interpretation: thyme in a dream indicates a person's inability to earn a living, and it is not good to see it. Interpretation of thyme in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen. Eating thyme according to Ibn Shaheen: eating it indicates a quarrel, and it was said to be harmful, and a lack of money, and a bad sight. Interpretation of buying thyme in a dream. Whoever dreams that he buys thyme intending to cook or cook it, then his purchase in this vision is a loss of money or a shortage in livelihood. And whoever dreams that he buys thyme for medicine and treatment, then the vision is praiseworthy. If the dreamer is sick, then buying thyme in a dream indicates recovery. Buying thyme in a dream of the rich and wealthy indicates a loss of money or a shortage of it. But in a dream about the poor or needy, it indicates self-sufficiency in livelihood, gain, and sustenance. Buying thyme is also disliked in the dream of the debtor (the person who has many debts) because it indicates an increase in debts and an inability to pay them. As for the prisoner or the afflicted, and whoever sees in his sleep that he is buying thyme, then by God's permission, he will witness salvation, innocence, and salvation. On the condition that he does not see that the seller has received the price of what the fortuneteller bought, otherwise the vision is interpreted in reverse according to a general rule in dream interpretation that says: All purchases in dreams are worthy of praise in dreams, unless the sleeper sees the seller receiving his price. Interpretation of giving thyme in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is taking thyme from someone he knows, then he will quarrel with him. And whoever dreams of giving him dry or dried thyme, then this is interpreted as estrangement and aversion... because it is disliked in interpretation for a man to give his wife dry thyme, and it is disliked for him to eat it, because in both cases: thyme expresses enmity, conflict, and distance .. And perhaps separation .. And those who are sick, both male and female, are exempt from this interpretation. Interpretation of eating thyme in a dream. Khalil Ibn Shaheen Al-Zahiri disliked eating thyme in a dream and said about it: Eating thyme is an indication of worry, sadness, and distress, especially if the purpose of eating it is not for treatment and healing. Whoever dreams of eating thyme and eats it, then its interpretation is exhaustion in profit, lack of resourcefulness, lack of money, and a difficult life. Interpretation of eating thyme in a dream. Whoever dreams of drinking thyme soaked in water or tea during illness, then thyme in this context of interpretation is healing. In the same context, it is preferable to see the sleeper as if he is drinking thyme, because it expresses worries and problems, because the property of oils in visions cancels out evil and harm, even if the symbol (thyme) is disliked in its interpretation. Also, drinking coffee with thyme in a dream is disliked, because both in the interpretation express hardship, anxiety, and seriousness. If the dreamer finds bitterness in drinking thyme in a dream, then its interpretation is bitterness in his life. Interpretation of thyme in a dream. Seeing thyme in a dream is one of the unfavorable visions. Whoever dreams that he is eating thyme, then he will fall into a dispute or argument. The vision may indicate his loss. According to the interpretation, thyme is disliked by those engaged in trade because it represents loss. Seeing thyme in a dream for a sick or injured person is interpreted in the opposite of what is stated in the book (Al-Isharat fi 'Ilm Al-Ibrayat) as thyme in this regard indicates healing and recovery, especially when drinking or eating it. Green herb oil in a dream, if used for medical purposes in waking life, are positive symbols for pregnant women or sick men. Interpretation of thyme in a dream for a single woman. And thyme in general indicates blows and disturbances, and it is said that it is sadness and sorrow for whoever saw it in a dream as if he ate it. It is bad and harmful and harmful if the girl or single woman sees that she is buying it or using it for cooking or cooking. If the purpose of buying or using it in a dream is to treat a sick or ill person, then thyme is considered good and a sign of the disappearance of worry and distress in general. Interpretation of buying thyme in a single woman's dream. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying thyme from the market or store, she may fear disappointment, failure, failure, or loss, especially if she sees that the thyme seller has received his price. Buying thyme is disapproved of in a single woman's dream, unless the purpose of buying it is for treatment and healing. If the unmarried woman is tired, worried, or sick and dreams of buying thyme, then the vision is considered auspicious, because buying the disliked symbolizes the revenge of evil and the aversion of affliction. Interpretation of giving thyme in a single woman's dream. Most interpreters dislike the interpretation of thyme in a dream because it was used in the past as incense that was placed inside the coffins of the dead during funerals. It is also inappropriate for an unmarried woman to take thyme or give it to her lover or fiancée, because thyme here may indicate competition or...

title: Ibn Sirin's Dream Interpretation of a Gecko

html

Dream Interpretation of Abu Baris can symbolize many negative meanings for the fortune teller, the lizard or the gecko is one of the hated reptiles that the Prophet, peace be upon him, warned us of the serious harm it causes to people, and so is dreaming of it, and since this vision is common and widespread among people, we found that we need to know all the details and what it indicates through the opinions of the great commentators, you will find all this and more in this article. Follow us.

Dream Interpretation of Abu Baris

  • Ibn Shaheen Al-Zahiri sees that seeing the lizard is nothing but a sign of the existence of an enemy near the gossipers, but he has no way. Ibn Shaheen summarized that seeing Abu Baris is not good at all, no matter how different the events of the vision are.
  • Leprosy in a dream is a sign of the immorality of the person who walks among people with gossip and turmoil, spreading evil and forbidding good.
  • The Prophet, peace be upon him, commanded us to kill the leper in the sanctuary and the holy place; because it is one of the reptiles that harm people.
  • Whoever sees a lot of gecko in a dream, this indicates the spread of strife, conflicts, and gossip in all segments of society, and walking on the wall indicates the presence of a person between the dreamer and one of his parents.
  • While if the leper walked over the dreamer's body, this is a sign that symbolizes the existence of a corrupt person who the seer is safe from. The seer's ability to get rid of all the calamities that befell him before.
  • Seeing a leper entering the house indicates the corruption of family relationships due to the spread of rumors and turmoil among them, while seeing him in the fields and orchards is a warning vision.
  • Whoever sees the lizard in his drink and food, this vision indicates that he is sitting with bad companions who are close to him and talking to them, and among the unfavorable visions that should be guarded against is seeing the gecko in the bed, as it indicates the unsuitability of the wife. or the presence of a jinn who wants to separate the couple.
  • Seeing the leper larger than its natural size indicates the presence of a hypocrite who charms people with his words but is in fact a deceitful person with no good behind him.

Dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Abu Baris

  • Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the lizard in a dream refers to the stray class of people who seek corruption and command evil and keep it away from good.
  • Also, seeing Abu Baris symbolizes the act of sin and openness without shame or fear, while eating it in a dream leads to evil and gossip, whoever sees himself eating the lizard's flesh, this is evidence that he is one of the gossipers. .
  • The interpretation of seeing the war is completely different from Abu Baris , as it refers to the category of kings, ministers and their direct environment, in addition to men of strength and determination.

Dream Interpretation of the Lizard for a Single Woman

  • There are many interpretations that symbolize that seeing the gecko in a dream for a girl indicates the presence of an enemy in her life and a cunning gossip, and anyone who sees himself in a dream chasing Abu Baris and chasing him to kill him, this is the girl who has good deeds and seeks to do good and forbid evil, and if she succeeds in killing him, this indicates getting rid of all temptations and stray desires.
  • As for seeing the leper walking on her body, this indicates her connection with the people of temptation and tolerance with them, so that she does not separate from them.
  • Seeing a large number of lizards in dreams symbolizes invasion and spreading gossip among those around her.
  • If the girl sees Abu Baris in her dream and feels fear and awe of him, this indicates the weakness of her faith and the fear of people from temptation.
  • Among the praiseworthy visions in a single woman's dream is seeing herself defeating the lizard and catching it. This is good news for her, indicating her victory over her enemies and her overcoming them.

Abu Baris Chases Me Dream Interpretation for a Single Woman

  • Seeing a leper chasing an unmarried woman in her dream means that she is surrounded by many inappropriate women and wants to get rid of them, but she cannot.
  • One of the undesirable dreams is to dream of a lizard in a dream for a girl while she is chasing her, because of its many frightening connotations, as it indicates acts of deception and witchcraft, as well as the presence of evil people in the dreamer's life, and it can indicate illness and enemies, in addition to the deception of those close to her.

Dream Interpretation of the Fall of Abu Baris in a Single Woman's Dream

  • It is a hated vision in the dream of an unmarried woman because it leads to evil and harm from those close to her.
  • The fall of the leper on a girl who has never married is a sign of caution in her emotional dealings in the coming days, and the interpretation of this vision in general symbolizes envy, hatred, magic, gossip, and hatred through which the girl is in her country. ZOE.

Dream Interpretation of the Married Lizard

  • One of the dreams that haunts the woman is to see the lizard in her sleep, as some interpreted this vision as the presence of many family problems and crises in her life, and therefore she must be careful.
  • If the married woman sees that she is killing leprosy and taking it out of it, this is one of the visions that brings good tidings, because it symbolizes the solution to all family and financial problems, and getting a lot of money and livelihood, then paying off all her debts.
  • The presence of the leper in the woman's kitchen in a dream symbolizes that the source of food is from haram money and therefore its impurity.

Fear of the Lizard in a Dream for a Married Woman

  • The leper in a woman's dream, and fear of him, warns of harm from people in her life, and she needs to be careful of them.
  • Whoever sees Abu Baris in bed and is afraid of him, this symbolizes that her partner is betraying her and his desire to keep her away from him in the coming days.
  • Seeing Abu Baris dark in color walking around the house and scaring me, this dream leads to the escalation of many problems and crises between her and her husband, which may lead to separation.
  • Fear of the leper and the effort to get him out of the house is a joyful vision, as it symbolizes the strength of her faith, her closeness to God, and her adherence to religious teachings.
  • Seeing Abu Baris big and being afraid of him in a dream is an indication that the woman will suffer from serious injustice in her life from a person who has authority over her, and fear generally symbolizes sins and transgressions, and it can enable the devil to see her.

Escape of the Lizard in a Dream for a Married Woman

  • Escaping the lizard has multiple meanings, as it symbolizes the wife's escape from trouble and bearing the family responsibility.
  • While the lizard escaped and the wife was able to kill it, this is a sign of getting rid of financial crises and everything that disturbs her life in the coming days. This vision may symbolize the presence of people close to her who are plotting against her and want to besiege her.
  • While seeing the lizard on the head of one of the children leads to the son being exposed to health problems, and it may indicate that one of his sons is in danger.
  • Seeing the leper in her workplace indicates that one of her colleagues is harming her and he is …
